lead_paragraph: The Pro Bowl linebacker Shawne Merriman, who missed last week’s game with a sprained left knee, appears ready to start for San Diego on Monday night, when the Chargers play host to the Denver Broncos.“I’ve been doing pretty much everything the whole week,” Merriman said Saturday after practice. “I feel good, I’m moving around good and I’m expecting to play.”Merriman’s one concession to his injury will be a knee brace. “Sometimes it hampers my change of direction and it prevents me from doing certain things,” he said.
